law.text:
A loan made pursuant to KRS 183.200 to 183.213:
Shall be repayable in not more than ten (10) years, although the secretary may contract that it shall be repayable in less time.
Shall be secured by a mortgage on airport property or such other security as the secretary may deem acceptable.

metadata.former-history: Repealed 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 179, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 938j-6.
metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Title to property; contracts with state and Federal governments; tax exemption; alienation of property.
